ygData.subject: Re: Large Ruby
ygData.msgSnippet: Woohoo!  I ll be working this quest tonite then. I have a dwarf cleric friend who really wants a midnight mallet. ... From: Sean Ross  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Woohoo! I'll be working this quest tonite then.

I have a dwarf cleric friend who really wants a midnight mallet.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Ross <sross@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 9:42 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby


>From: Sean Ross <sross@...>
>
>the ruby from chomper does work however, the chance of getting the items
from
>the troll is 50 50.
>
>mark mark wrote:
>
>> From: mark mark <markerob@...>
>>
>> I have killed chomper, he is easy. Like slashing a regular fish. He
drops
>> a large ruby, but it's a lore item. The ruby that you need for the quest
>> isn't a lore item. The only way I know of to get them is buying them off
of
>> an npc merchant. I, being a barbarian, have not tried giving the ruby
from
>> chomper. But I've had someone else do it and it dosn't work. I would be
>> very interested in finding out who drops a regular ruby if anyone knows.
Oh
>> and I have a brutechopper, I love it 17dmg 50 delay.
>>
>> Arathorne, sol ro
>>
>> >From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>> >Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> >To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>> >Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby
>> >Date: Tue, 22 Jun 1999 13:59:18 -0400
>> >
>> >From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>> >
>> >Hrm,
>> >
>> >Thats odd. Crappy too. I feel like emailing the guys over at EQ'lizer
and
>> >asking them where the heck they got the ruby from in innothule swamp.
>> >
>> >The only mob that i have heard of that drops a ruby is the fish called
>> >Chomper or something of the like in the rivervale lake. Someone posted
that
>> >a few weeks ago on this list. Im not sure how hard of a mob he is but i
can
>> >imagine killing a fish isnt too too easy. Especially one that drops
rubies.
>> >
>> >Anyway if someone finds out what drops this ruby in Innothule be sure to
>> >let
>> >me know.
>> >
>> >Thanks
>> >
>> >John
>> >
>> > > ----------
>> > > From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
>> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > > Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 1:41 PM
>> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby
>> > >
>> > > From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>> > >
>> > > The only way I know of to complete the quest you are working on is to
>> > > purchase the ruby from a gem dealer for aroudn 150p.
>> > >
>> > > If you discover the mob that drobs rubies, or another location to
find
>> > > one,
>> > > please share.
>> > >
